title: Swap on Uniswap Base
description: Complete your first swap on Uniswap's Base deployment. Join millions of users trading on the world's leading DEX.
verificationLogic: Check for Swap event emission from user address on Uniswap V3 Router

title: Create on BasePaint
description: Express your creativity on BasePaint. Contribute to the collaborative canvas and become part of Base's creative community.
verificationLogic: Check Transfer event from BasePaint contract to user address

title: Moonwell Governance: Start Delegating
description: Empower your voice in the Moonwell ecosystem by delegating your WELL tokens to yourself or a representative to enable voting power on Base.
actionRequired: Delegate WELL voting power to any address on Base mainnet
verificationLogic: Monitor the DelegateChanged(address,address,address) event on the WELL contract where the delegator matches the user address.

title: Swap on Uniswap Base
description: Complete your first swap on Uniswap's Base deployment. Join millions of users trading on the world's leading DEX.
verificationLogic: Check for Swap event emission from user address on Uniswap V3 Router

title: BasePaint: Artistic Initiation
description: Experience the pulse of Base art culture. Mint today's collaborative canvas to own a piece of history and join the community masterpiece.
actionRequired: Mint at least one BasePaint NFT for the current day's canvas.
verificationLogic: Detect the emission of a Transfer event from the 0x0 null address to the user's address on the target contract within the last 24 hours.

title: Zora Explorer: Mint Your First NFT
description: Start your digital collection on Base by minting an edition from any creator on the Zora protocol.
actionRequired: Complete a mint transaction on any Zora Creator 1155 contract on Base.
verificationLogic: Verify transaction to the Zora Mint Manager contract or check for TransferSingle events emitted by Zora Creator 1155 contracts to the user's wallet.

title: Create on BasePaint
description: Express your creativity on BasePaint. Contribute to the collaborative canvas and become part of Base's creative community.
verificationLogic: Check Transfer event from BasePaint contract to user address

title: Aerodrome Governance: Locking for veAERO
description: Contribute to the Base ecosystem by locking AERO tokens to receive veAERO, allowing you to vote on protocol emissions and governance proposals.
actionRequired: Lock at least 50 AERO tokens in the Aerodrome VotingEscrow contract.
verificationLogic: Verify the CreateLock event emitted by contract 0xeBf67A85299f9722c59637269394472432e14580 where the provider is the user address and the value is greater than or equal to 50e18.
